attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Be a positive force in the world.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: Heartbroken over loss of wife, daughter, and orphans.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LFF-6jniS9uQ0Azafjb_itemcontent
attribs.current: While wearing these dark lenses, you have darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision. wearing the goggles increases its range by 60 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LJ5kak5BSyZ1og36Avn_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LUl5pIdZmjY5q7e1nOX_itemcontent
attribs.current: A quiver can hold up to 20 arrows.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LUmnnvS69qVb93HNdnF_itemcontent
attribs.current: While wearing this helm, you can use an action to cast the comprehend languages spell from it at will.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LUsKrM5WK8x9qZUI-3J_spelldescription
attribs.current: A willing beast becomes your eyes and ears while the spell lasts. You can no longer perceive your own senses, becoming blind and deaf, but your perception through the beast includes any special senses the beast may have. You may end the spell early using your action to regain your own senses.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LUsLC4KPlmW5erF0p0-_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Although limited by the intelligence of the beast, you can understand and speak with beasts. You learn about the beast's experiences over the last day, as well as local places and creatures.

If your DM allows, the beast may also complete a small task for you, if you can successfully convince it to do so.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LW-U7Gj3urJ86Z51CZd_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Requires Attunement

You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LW-U7Gj3urJ86Z51CZd_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ring, Ac +1, Saving Throws +1

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LW-U8Arze3RHoIfrVzN_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Requires Attunement

You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LW-U8Arze3RHoIfrVzN_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ring, Ac +1, Saving Throws +1

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LW-UG0QKFM7FJsiXjbt_itemcontent
attribs.current: While holding this shield, you have a +3 bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK1awZdc7mQWEeF5wR_description
attribs.current: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK2A3ofyOLi6a0kNjH_description
attribs.current:
Combat Superiority
When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you learn maneuvers that are fueled by special dice called superiority dice.

Maneuvers. You learn three maneuvers of your choice. Many maneuvers enhance an attack in some way. You can use only one maneuver per attack. You learn two additional maneuvers of your choice at 7th, 10th, and 15th level. Each time you learn new maneuvers, you can also replace one maneuver you know with a different one.

Superiority Dice. You have four superiority dice, which are d8s. A superiority die is expended when you use it. You regain all of your expended superiority dice when you finish a short or long rest. You gain another superiority die at 7th level and one more at 15th level.

Saving Throws. Some of your maneuvers require your target to make a saving throw to resist the maneuver's effects. The saving throw DC is calculated as follows:

Maneuver save DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice)

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK2fcBxTI9ViHlgNDZ_description
attribs.current: At 3rd level, you gain proficiency with one type of artisan's tools of your choice.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK2lGgv0bGMOtjD4bl_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 7th level, if you spend at least 1 minute observing or interacting with another creature outside combat, you can learn certain information about its capabilities compared to your own. The DM tells you if the creature is your equal, superior, or inferior in regard to two of the following characteristics of your choice:

• Strength score
• Dexterity score
• Constitution score
• Armor Class
• Current hit points
• Total class levels, if any
• Fighter class levels, if any

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK2rt-OYC9DxK84m7P_description
attribs.current: At 10th level, your superiority dice turn into d10s. At 18th level, they turn into d12s.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK2zrUTiZbz6v6UA-E_description
attribs.current: Starting at 15th level, when you roll initiative and have no superiority dice remaining, you regain 1 superiority die.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK3UkkixPJe2tLsQy6_description
attribs.current: When making a ranged attack while you are within 5 feet of a hostile creature, you do not have disadvantage on the attack roll. Your ranged attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover against targets within 30 feet of you. You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls on ranged attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK4jzxVppO9SGNsi0F_description
attribs.current: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. The number of attacks increases to three when you reach 11th level in this class and to four when you reach 20th level in this class.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcK5TukC69rIrg7oIdU_itemcontent
attribs.current:
You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon. A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcK5TukC69rIrg7oIdU_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 600, Ranged Attacks +2, Ranged Damage +2

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK6YF9rX7BWbdOudJG_description
attribs.current:
Attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged weapon attack rolls.
Your ranged weapons ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.
Before you make a ranged attack with a ranged weapon with which you are proficient, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If you do so and the attack hits, it deals +10 damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcK7ZD8uouI4QzMqJ8D_itemcontent
attribs.current: You have a +2 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcK7ZD8uouI4QzMqJ8D_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Heavy Armor, AC: 18, Ac +2

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK8EXqeRWf0FZS4JIf_description
attribs.current: When you make a weapon attack roll against a creature, you can expend one superiority dieto add it to the roll. You can use this maneuver before or after making the attack roll, but before any effects of the attack are applied.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK8LT2WjDcihD6HL0k_description
attribs.current: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one superiority dieto attempt to goad the target into attacking you. You add the superiority dieto the attack’s damage roll, and the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK8d3kKGE7w53yEbnd_description
attribs.current: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one superiority dieto attempt to disarm the target, forcing it to drop one item of your choice that it’s holding. You add the superiority dieto the attack’s damage roll, and the target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it drops the object you choose. The object lands at its feet.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK8ncaoleGNEK6bpkG_description
attribs.current: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one superiority die to distract the creature, giving your allies an opening. You add the superiority die to the attack’s damage roll. The next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than you has advantage if the attack is made before the start of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcK98A0Xh6XuGm5wxAD_description
attribs.current: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one superiority die to attempt to knock the target down. You add the superiority die to the attack’s damage roll, and if the target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, you knock the target prone.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LcK9PFSoV5Yte1t69QW_atk_desc
attribs.current: When you make a weapon attack roll against a creature, you can expend one superiority dieto add it to the roll. You can use this maneuver before or after making the attack roll, but before any effects of the attack are applied.

attribs.current: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one superiority dieto attempt to goad the target into attacking you. You add the superiority dieto the attack’s damage roll, and the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on all attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LcKA2nfFkD7v9bKEint_atk_desc
attribs.current: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one superiority dieto attempt to disarm the target, forcing it to drop one item of your choice that it’s holding. You add the superiority dieto the attack’s damage roll, and the target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it drops the object you choose. The object lands at its feet.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcKEIBLN-CTSCloDpLT_itemcontent
attribs.current: You regain 2d4 + 2 hit points when you drink this potion.  The potion's red liquid glimmers when agitated.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LcKHyNf3-ZeGdHTa-U-_itemcontent
attribs.current: While wearing this cloak with its hood up, you can breathe underwater, and you have a swimming speed of 60 feet. Pulling the hood up or down requires an action.
